doc:
Doris Lloyd https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doris_Lloyd 0 Hessy Doris Lloyd (3 July 1896 – 21 May 1968) was an English-American actress of screen and stage. She is perhaps best known for her roles in The Time Machine (1960) and The Sound of Music (1965). During her career, Lloyd appeared in two Oscar Best Picture winners and four other nominees. Hessy_Doris_Lloyd ( 3_July_1896 – 21_May_1968 ) was an_English-American_actress of screen_and_stage . She is_perhaps_best_known for her_roles in The_Time_Machine_(_1960_) and The_Sound of Music_(_1965_) . During her_career , Lloyd appeared in two_Oscar_Best_Picture_winners and four_other_nominees .
